resource-scheduler
******************


Description
===========

Use the Resource scheduler CLI to manage schedules, to perform actions
on a collection of resources.


Available Commands
==================

* resource-type-collection

  * list-resource-types

* schedule

  * activate

  * create

  * deactivate

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* work-request

  * cancel

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
